posts.post_content:
After seeing the results of last night's Rea Auction I have decided to offer a complete T209 Series/Type 1 Contentena Set for sale.  I was fortunate to have purchased this set on net54 from a board member this past summer.

The set offered here averages 2.40 as compared to the average of the full set of items sold last night which averaged only 1.75.  Additionally, the five most difficult players to obtain (Booles, Lane, Martin, Pope and Sisson ) average a grade of 2.00 for this set as compared to those same players that sold last night at an average of 1.90.   

The combined hammer price of the cards last night totaled $6450, after the 20% premium, and adding on top of it say 6% sales tax and $50 for shipping it brings the total to over $6850.    

I am offering my set at $old venmo friends or $old pp gs which will include shipping.  Given the superior grade of my set this will be a firm price.  

Grades of the individual players are as follows:

Cooper PSA 1
Sisson PSA 1
Fullenwider SGC 3
Bourquise SGC 3
Lane SGC 3
McGeehan SGC 2.5
Pope SGC 1.5
Stubbe SGC 2
Cowell SGC 3
Crockett SGC 3
Booles SGC 1.5
Walsh SGC 1.5
Martin SGC 3
Gilmore SGC 2
Armstrong SGC 2.5
Hoffman SGC 5

Thanks for looking and please message if interested.  I can provide additional pictures if you require them.

Note: I will have to add 6% sales tax to any purchaser residing in NC.
